message.content:
cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.NE 

Reasoning: The paper discusses direct policy gradient methods for reinforcement learning and continuous control problems, which are commonly studied in the machine learning and robotics communities. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also discusses system identification and model-based planning in optimal control theory, which are relevant to the fields of robotics and control systems, suggesting that cs.RO (Robotics) and cs.SY (Systems and Control) are also likely sub-categories. Additionally, the paper discusses the computational and statistical properties of the methods, which are relevant to the fields of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and neural networks (cs.NE).
